p: The superior performance of the ML-based tool may stem from its use of supervised learning, which enables it to adapt to the data and learn parameters instead of relying on fixed, predefined parameters34. However, the performance of Aiforia also showed limitations, manifested by its tendency to pick more positively Ki67-stained cells, including (i) faintly stained Ki67 positive tumor cells which were dismissed by the pathologist (SL), or (ii) Ki67 positively stained proliferating non-tumor cells, resulting in a slightly higher estimated score.
